item.title: A final farewell to Lane Kiffin and the rest of the Bottom 10
item.description: With the season over and the final votes tallied, we crown the best of the worst -- on and off the field.

item.title: Bracketology: Michigan is the new No. 1 overall seed?!
item.description: The Big Ten has never had a better chance to end its 25-year national championship drought.

item.title: Men's ACC/SEC Challenge guide: What UNC, Duke, Syracuse wins tell us
item.description: This season's event features three ranked matchups, plus more top-25 teams in action this week.

item.title: Huskers earn top overall seed in NCAA tournament
item.description: Undefeated Nebraska earned the No. 1 overall seed in the NCAA women's volleyball tournament bracket released Sunday.

item.title: UNC volleyball's Jackie Taylor honors late father, NFL legend Sean Taylor
item.description: Jackie Taylor wears No. 21 for North Carolina. When she leaps for a ball and slams it to the ground, NFL fans remember a man she never met.
